forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
The morning greets Downtown San Francisco with a bright complexion, the sun casting a gentle light that dances off the city's iconic structures. The high will reach a comfortable 67 degrees, sailing smoothly into the afternoon where temperatures will slightly dip, settling around 64. The southwest winds whisper through the streets, a pleasant companion at speeds of 6 to 13 miles per hour, lending a refreshing touch as they occasionally gust higher. Though there's a promise of a clear day ahead, one may notice the edges of the marine layer still drifting along the coastline and clinging softly to the hills. The views across the bay, particularly towards the Golden Gate, reveal a clarity punctuated by soft, wispy clouds.

As the sun begins to wane into the evening, expect the clouds to gather as the night approaches, ushering in a low of about 55 degrees. It is advisable to don light layers—perhaps a breezy cardigan or a light jacket—for the evening strolls or casual dining al fresco. Activities abound in this delightful weather; a leisurely visit to a local café, sipping coffee while watching the world drift by, or perhaps a casual walk along the waterfront, taking in the serenity of the bay. The charm of the afternoon beckons exploration, urging you to embrace the essence of what San Francisco offers on such a splendid day.
